title: Jesus is Tenderly Calling Home

author.name: Fanny J. Crosby
author.bio: Fanny J. Crosby was an American mission worker, poet, lyricist, and composer. She was one of the most prolific hymnists in history, writing over 8,000 hymns and gospel songs, with over 100 million copies of her songs printed. Crosby was known for her Christian devotion and hymns that inspire faith and hope.

lyrics:
Jesus is tenderly calling Thee home,
Calling today, calling today,
Why from the sunshine
Of love wilt Thou roam,
Farther and farther away?

CHORUS
Calling today,
Calling today
Jesus is calling,
Is tenderly calling today.

Jesus is calling the weary to rest,
Calling today, calling today,
Bring Him Thy burden
And Thou shalt be blest,
He will not turn Thee away.

Jesus is waiting,
O come to Him now,
Waiting today, waiting today,
Come with thy sins,
At His feet lowly bow,
Come, and no longer delay.

Jesus is pleading,
O list to His voice,
Hear Him today, hear Him today,
They who believe
On His name shall rejoice,
Quickly arise and away.
